source.d6c9e59e:
**<font size="5">Swarm Plots</font>**

Used when one of the variable is categorical in nature (stripplot). Swampplot is similar to stripplot, but in this the points are adjusted in categorical axis so that they don't overlap.
source.0f0c0969:
**<font size="5">Box plots + Swarm Plots</font>**

Swarm plots are generally used along with box plots to show all observations along with underlying distribution.
source.f71c46af:
**<font size="5">Box Plots</font>**

Displays data in five number summary, minimum, 25th quartile, median, 75th quartile and maximum along with outliers in the data along the axis.
